thumbnail.alt: 3 Salt and Straw cups filled with scoops of luscious ice cream

menu_items.name: Captain's Berried Treasure (v)
menu_items.description: Cereal-steeped Coconut and Oat Milk swimming with fruity House-made "Crunch Berries".

menu_items.name: Cornflake Cookies with Marionberry Jam
menu_items.description: Brown Butter Cornflake Cookies folded into a malty, Cereal-steeped Ice Cream and finished with swirls of Marionberry Jam.

menu_items.name: Snap N' Crackle Marshmallow Treats
menu_items.description: Rice Krispie Marshmallow Florentines crushed and scattered throughout Salted Vanilla Ice Cream.

menu_items.name: Peanut Butter Brownie Cereal Puffs
menu_items.description: Double-baked, Peanut Butter-glazed Brownies tossed into Peanut Butter-marbled Milk Chocolate Ice Cream.

menu_items.name: Pots of Gold and Rainbows
menu_items.description: Hand-sorted Rainbow Marshmallows playfully tossed into a Cereal-steeped Ice Cream.

menu_items.name: Sea Salt with Caramel Ribbons
menu_items.description: We created this Ice Cream with Mark Bitterman, the owner and "selmelier" at The Meadow, the internationally renowned Portland Salt shop. He actually wrote the book on Salt, Salted, a James Beard Award winning cookbook. We use their Fleur de Sel, which is made in Guatemala from Salt pans that are famed for supplying the Mayan Empire at the height of its power. We've topped it off by ribboning in Hand-burned Caramel that we make in house!

menu_items.name: Salted Malted Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
menu_items.description: Rich, chunky bites of chewy salty and malty Homemade Cookie Dough. Mixed into a super Vanilla-y Ice Cream and finished with licks of Malted Fudge Swirls.

menu_items.name: Double Fold Vanilla
menu_items.description: Made with Singing Dog Vanilla from Eugene, OR. 'Double Fold' means that they use twice as many Vanilla Beans to pack an amazing Vanilla punch. But the really good sounding part is that they not only pay a fair price for Vanilla, but also give a percent of the proceeds back to farmers when the product sells in the US. It's great Ice Cream, doing something great.

menu_items.name: Chocolate Gooey Brownie
menu_items.description: This is Chocolate Ice Cream at its simplest and most indulgent. We've teamed up with Valrhona to make a base that is rich, dark, fudgy, and chocolatey. Our in-house baked, gooey Brownies have Marshmallows baked into them to create a Brownie that treads awfully close to the point of being Fudge.

menu_items.name: Honey Lavender
menu_items.description: Oregon-grown Lavender petals are carefully steeped in Honey to extract that perfect floral flavor. We are proud to use Bee Local Honey in this Ice Cream, their Honey is harvested from urban hives all around Portland resulting in flavor that is unique and changing throughout the year.

menu_items.name: Pear and Blue Cheese
menu_items.description: We candy Oregon bartletts to bring our their flavor, then fold in cave-aged crumbles of Rogue Creamery blue cheese (voted best in the world) for a bold thwack.

menu_items.name: Arbequina Olive Oil
menu_items.description: A simple combination thanks to incredible Oregon olive oil. We love enhancing its tropical, grassy flavors and rich, buttery texture in ice cream.

menu_items.name: Coffee & Love Nuts
menu_items.description: An Ice Cream as cozy and comforting as Sunday morning, created in tribute to Compartés founder Jonathan Grahm’s mission to share love through chocolate. We brew a smooth, Caramel-y medium Roast Coffee from Colombia, blend it with our Cream, and stud it with Compartés immaculate Love Nuts–pecans Caramelized in Tahitian Vanilla, sprinkled with Sea Salt, then coated in 14 layers of Chocolate. Made with Compartés Chocolates

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Snickerdoodle
menu_items.description: We fold our House-baked chewy Snickerdoodle Cookies into ice cream that’s spiked with the most intensely spiced, warm Cinnamon.

menu_items.name: Strawberry Honey Balsamic with Black Pepper
menu_items.description: A strawberry triple threat. We steal a trick from the Italians, using Balsamic and citrusy Cubeb Black Pepper to help coax out the fruit's acidity and brightness.

menu_items.name: Freckled Mint Chocolate Chip (v)
menu_items.description: Coconut and pure Oregon Mint Oil coalesce into a delicate, floral Ice Cream, freckled with Organic Dark Chocolate. Made with Seely Mint

menu_items.name: Marionberry Coconut Sherbet (v)
menu_items.description: While we’re lucky enough in Oregon to have these hulking berries hit our markets in summer, most of the world has never heard of them. Coconut cream and a little sugar are the only things we need to let the sweet-tart complexity of the marionberries shine in this creamy, refreshing flavor.

menu_items.name: Peanut Butter Brittle Caramel Fudge (v)
menu_items.description: Our tribute to the most iconic duo of all time: Chocolate & Peanut butter. Creamy Coconut Vanilla Ice Cream is drizzled with a housemade semi-sweet Caramel Fudge Swirl then flecked with shards of crispy, crackly Brittle studded with Peanut Butter. The juxtaposition of textures and flavors coalesce for a rich yet balanced bite reminiscent of the iconic childhood treat, Moose Tracks.

menu_items.name: Margarita
menu_items.description: A 10" Pizza with Marinara sauce, Mozzarella, fresh Basil, a House Salad with Balsamic Dressing & a Tiramisu dessert.

menu_items.name: Pepperoni
menu_items.description: A 10" Pizza with Marinara sauce, Mozzarella, Pepperoni, grated Parmesan, a House Salad with Balsamic Dressing & a Tiramisu dessert.

menu_items.name: Garden Vegetable
menu_items.description: A 10" Pizza with Marinara sauce, Spinach, Cheese Blend, Mozzarella, Roasted Red Peppers, Red Onion, Wild Mushroom, Black Olives & Cherry Tomatoes, a House Salad with Balsamic Dressing & a Tiramisu dessert.

menu_items.name: Squash Blossom & Proscutto
menu_items.description: A 10" Pizza with Marinara sauce, Mozzarella, Squash Blossom, Burrata, Prosciutto, Epazote, Alberquina Olive Oil, a House Salad with Balsamic Dressing & a Tiramisu dessert.

menu_items.name: Meat Lovers
menu_items.description: A 10" Pizza with Marinara sauce, Italian Sausage, Pepperoni, Calabrese, Mozzarella & fresh Basil, a House Salad with Balsamic Dressing & a Tiramisu dessert

name: Storytellers Cafe
additional_info: Storytellers Cafe is temporarily closed for refurbishment for a few weeks. During the time of closure, Mickey’s Tales of Adventure Breakfast Buffet and Brunch will be available in the Trillium Room. Celebrate with Mickey Mouse and some of his closest pals. For non-character dining please visit Hearthstone Lounge, with expanded hours and offerings, in addition to the many nearby restaurants within the Disneyland Resort. During this time, Storytellers Cafe will also have a Dinner Buffet in the Trillium Room.

menu_items.description: For centuries, the Rose was planted at the beginning of a trellised row of grapevines. The Rose added beauty to the vineyard and attracts bees for pollination and a bountiful harvest. Additionally, the Rose warned the vintner of unfavorable conditions. We honor the Rose for its beauty and many contributions as we bring to you the Bounty of California and the Cuisine of Wine Country.

menu_items.name: Scotch Whisky
menu_items.description: Lindores Abby Scotch Lowland Single Malt, Compass Box Spaniard, Edradour 10yr, Glenturret Triple Wood. A true journey through the flavors and geography of Scotland and its wonderful contribution to the world of Single Malts.

menu_items.name: Rye Whisky
menu_items.description: Laws Whisky San Luis Valley Rye, Doc Swinson’s Bonded 7yr, Fox & Oden Rye, High Plains Blended Rye. A Unique offering of farm to table and sustainable Rye Whiskies that capture the spirit of America’s first Whiskey.

menu_items.name: Bourbon Whisky
menu_items.description: Doc Swinson’s Blended Straight Bourbon, Coppercraft Straight Bourbon, Dry Fly Bourbon 101, Gryphon & Grain Bourbon. A unique offering of sustainable and farm to table Bourbons that are sure to expand your palate and your appreciation.

menu_items.name: Japanese Whisky
menu_items.description: Kaiyo The Ramu 8yr, Kaiyo Mizunara Oak The Single 7yr, Kiuchi Hinomaru Celebration, Kiuchi Hinomaru 1st Edition. Sample some of Japan’s oldest and most innovative Whiskies that boast sea maturation as well as rare oak ages.
